statements: DELETE FROM BusinessIntelligenceReports WHERE report_id = 100 AND report_name = 'Quarterly Sales Report';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM report_data WHERE data_source_id = 2002 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM metrics WHERE metric_type = 'Sales' AND value < 1000;
DELETE FROM data_sources_usage WHERE analyst_id = 10 AND source_id = 5;
